leadSubtitle: For the Issuance & Safekeeping of Digital Guarantees
leadStatement: All parties, at source and in real-time.
solutionParagraph1: Guarantee Vault is a place for the issuance and safekeeping of digital guarantees. It gives banks & sureties the possibility to centrally issue and store instruments such as Bank Guarantees, Surety Bonds and Standby Letters of Credit in an electronic (paperless) form.
solutionParagraph2: This combination of central issuance with digital guarantees is an innovation that delivers significant value to all market participants including applicants, guarantors and beneficiaries.
solutionParagraph3: Through the transparency it brings, Guarantee Vault adds an additional layer of efficiency right throughout the guarantee life-cycle.
testimonialLindnerParagraph1: “Over the last 2 years we have worked closely with 15 corporates, sureties and banks to help make Guarantee Vault a reality. Our shared experiences, collaborative spirit and common vision are at the heart and soul of what Guarantee Vault is.
testimonialLindnerParagraph2: We proudly see this as a true market initiative, one that solves a wide spread common problem and brings efficiencies to all involved.”
testimonialEulerHermesParagraph1: “Running a paper based manual guarantee process has always been a challenge, even more so in this Covid-19 environment. We believe that digital guarantees are the solution, they increase transparency, create efficiencies and minimize risk.
testimonialEulerHermesParagraph2: The innovation that Guarantee Vault brings will benefit all parties including applicants, guarantors and beneficiaries”
testimonialBayernLbParagraph1: “It has been a great experience working with both corporate and financial stakeholders on the digitization of guarantees.
testimonialBayernLbParagraph2: Through Guarantee Vault we now have the possibility to offer all our customers the issuance, safe keeping and administration of digital guarantees in a secure and central place.
testimonialBayernLbParagraph3: For the first time, the complete end-to-end digitization of the entire guarantee transaction is possible, from applicant and issuer right through to beneficiary.
testimonialBayernLbParagraph4: We look forward to go-live and future developments.”
testimonialPorrParagraph1: “Working closely on the Guarantee Vault project with other market participants has been a great experience. For many years the lack of transparency in the Guarantee process today has been an on-going problem for us.
testimonialPorrParagraph2: Because of this, managing our portfolio of outstanding guarantees across all our banking and surety partners has been a significant challenge.
testimonialPorrParagraph3: Through the added transparency it brings, Guarantee Vault gives us oversight at source which solves the problem.”
testimonialAtradiusParagraph1: “Guarantee Vault’s digital guarantee solution enables a true end-to-end digitization of the guarantee life-cycle.
testimonialAtradiusParagraph2: The solution allows us to expand our service offering to clients, helping them better manage their business, reduce costs, improve efficiency and reduce risk.
testimonialAtradiusParagraph3: We are proud to be part of this true market initiative and look forward to the exciting journey ahead.”
testimonialGlobalTradeCorpParagraph1: “This is a first universal digital network that connects corporates with all types of guarantee issuers: banks, insurance companies and agents as well as export development and other government agencies. It also directly links corporates with each other, as applicants and beneficiaries.
testimonialGlobalTradeCorpParagraph2: The Guarantee Vault offering is based on open collaboration and transparent pricing. This approach facilitates acceptance by providers of trade finance IT solutions – one of the key elements for the wider market adoption.
testimonialGlobalTradeCorpParagraph3: We are pleased to offer seamless connectivity to the Guarantee Vault for all clients of the @GlobalTrade platform.”
servicesParagraph: Guarantee Vault offers long-term, secure and cost-effective services to applicants, guarantors, beneficiaries and intermediaries right across the life of a guarantee including application, issuance and post-issuance.
restApiParagraph1: Guarantee Vault delivers its services using a suite of REST APIs allowing all market participants to seamlessly connect and interact.
restApiParagraph2: Corporates, sureties, banks and other intermediaries can interface with Guarantee Vault via their existing platform, portal or other in-house systems.
restApiParagraph3: In this way all participants can connect to access and consume data, at source and in real-time.
restApiParagraph4-3: whilst Guarantee Vault APIs are secured using market standard authentication protocol
legalParagraph1: Electronic guarantees issued via Guarantee Vault are as legal, valid and binding as traditional (paper) guarantees.
legalParagraph2: When issuing guarantees on Guarantee Vault only the form of the guarantee is changed (i.e. paper to electronic) not their content.
legalParagraph3: Before offering its services in any country, Digital Vault Services GmbH conducts a thorough analysis and validates that the national law governing guarantees in that market allows for electronic form.
legalParagraph4: Digital Vault Services GmbH works with the following legal partners in this regard
newsParagraph1: Together with Peter Grätz from Bayerische Landesbank and Sven Matzelsberger from Lindner Group KG our managing director Ludger Janssen presented the Guarantee Vault, a place for the issuance and safe-keeping of digital guarantees.
